PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-14152001-08-010,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval for the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to grant EASEMENTS or RIGHTS- OF-WAY, as follows: (a) to the CITY OF OTTAWA, for a water main on Queen Elizabeth Drive, (b) to the MUNICIPALITY OF LA PÊCHE, for its sewage system, (c) to the Parish of the Epiphany of the Incorporated Synod of the Diocese of Ottawa, and (d) to the CITY OF HULL, for its Moore Creek storm water works and for its Lac des Fées residential storm water sewer.
Attachments
